task.title: Fix codex TOML config parsing: RELAY_STRICT_AGENT_NAME must be quoted string

events.content: Quote RELAY_STRICT_AGENT_NAME value as string in codex TOML config: Quote RELAY_STRICT_AGENT_NAME value as string in codex TOML config

raw.question: Quote RELAY_STRICT_AGENT_NAME value as string in codex TOML config
raw.chosen: Quote RELAY_STRICT_AGENT_NAME value as string in codex TOML config
raw.reasoning: Codex --config flag parses TOML. Bare 1 is parsed as integer, but env vars expect strings. Wrapping in quotes ("1") forces TOML to treat it as a string. Added inline comment explaining this is intentional.

retrospective.summary: Fixed codex spawning crash caused by RELAY_STRICT_AGENT_NAME=1 being parsed as TOML integer instead of string. Changed to quoted "1" in snippets.rs codex config args and updated 2 matching tests. Added inline comment explaining the quoting is intentional.
